original_text: So were all those that were numbered of the children of Israel, by the house of their fathers, from twenty years old and upward, all that were able to go forth to war in Israel;
korean_text: 이같이 이스라엘 자손이 그 조상의 가문을 따라 이십 세 이상으로 싸움에 나갈 만한 이스라엘 자손이 다 계수되었으니

sentences.original_text: So were all those that were numbered
by the house of their fathers
from twenty years old and upward
all that were able to go forth to war
sentences.korean_translation: 전쟁에 나갈 수 있는 모든 자들이
